screen.useServerProvidedData.title: This server provides data to TPS-Hud
screen.useServerProvidedData.message: This server supports tps-hud and provides data to it. Do you want tps-hud to use this data? (This can be changed later)
toast.useServerProvidedData.message: The TPS display will be more accurate!
option.tpshud.satisfyTpsCount.tooltip: This will "fake" the tps count. Basically if the exact tps are 19.891, 20.0 will be displayed just to satisfy the user.
option.tpshud.textShadow.tooltip: Whether the text should drop shadow or not
option.tpshud.useServerProvidedData: Use data provided by the server
option.tpshud.useServerProvidedData.tool: If enabled, the tps display will be way more accurate as it uses data provided by the server directly
However, the server must have tpshud installed as a mod or plugin for this to function.
